attacks.name: Bright Tone
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Euphoria GX
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
